title: Kartal beats lucky loser after Bencic withdraws
summary: Great Britain's Sonay Kartal beats lucky loser Renata Zarazua to reach the last eight of the Abu Dhabi Open after original opponent - and defending champion - Belinda Bencic withdraws through illness.

title: Maisie Hill: From career-threatening crash to snowboarding star
summary: Great Britain snowboarder Maisie Hill suffered life-threatening injuries after crashing into a wall of ice during a training session in 2023. Nearly three years on, she says she feels "blessed" as she prepares to be a part of Team GB competing at the 2026 Winter Olympics.

title: How can Man City get Haaland firing again?
summary: BBC Sport's football tactics correspondent Umir Irfan analyses why Manchester City striker Erling Haaland has stopped scoring in the Premier League and looks at ways Pep Guardiola can get the centre-forward scoring regularly again.
